item.title: Snake
item.description: This is a snake clone that I made in Unreal Engine 5 to improve my knowledge of the engine. I uploaded a small gameplay video here. Main features: Grass rendering + grass blades bending Niagara: Snake body -> ribbon Grass bending direction Enhanced input Savegame system for tracking player record. Materials: Grass checkerboard pattern Snake body color In addition I added some visual debugging features, like snake body box colliders and tile occupancy to help me during development.
